alert.note: Alert for Mississippi; New Madrid (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 06 at 10:07AM CST until March 09 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Missouri... Mississippi River at New Madrid. .The river will continue a slow fall, and is expected to fall below flood stage at New Madrid on Wednesday. For the Mississippi River...including New Madrid...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING CONTINUES THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at New Madrid. * WHEN...Until Wednesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 34.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to hover around 34.8 feet through this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
